Luxury at Hand

Expect the unexpected and accept nothing less than the best! Best in design, best in exceptional form and function, and best in relaxed elegance. Indulge yourself in the comfort and luxury that Pegasus represents. Whatever your inspiration, our experienced design professionals will help you transform your ideas in Luxury at Hand.

Pegasus is launching a new generation of product styles and collections. Each month we will bring you special articles and pictorial stories that present how you can enrich your lifestyle and enhance your home with these new innovations from Pegasus.

Great design combines a balance of beauty and convenience. The Pegasus collections embody just that. Groups like our Eclectic and Contemporary collections merge superb materials with sleek, international design. Rich contours and sensual shapes are blended with classic details to create the new heirloom sophistication in our Classic and Transitional lines.

Pegasus is committed to bringing you information on our new trends and styles as forecasted by our leading design experts. We will provide exciting make-over tips, design ideas and new innovations that suggest ways you might integrate the Pegasus lines into your perfect settings. Our wide range of styles and aesthetics bring together world-class artistry and craftsmanship that mark the signature of our brand.

Each month you will find new articles about what we consider to be one of the leading product lines in the market today. Pegasus. Unencumbered refinement. Extraordinary luxury. Exquisite design. Exceptional value.

Thank you for joining us. We are here to inspire you with attainable luxury for your unique lifestyle and individual taste. Pegasus Luxury at Hand.
